channel.title: WebHosting + Forum Creation. Ultimate Space, Ultimate Price
channel.description:
[center]Hello, I am Josh of RunePalace, and Flash of google for those of you who are wondering why a new member is posting so much. Anyways, lets get to the point. I run a web hosting service for RSPS forums, and other forums if you need them but I do best in the creation of RSPS communities and server forums. I offer webhosting for $10 a month, this includes a forums, and my assistance with it, along with all the little enhancements my webhost offers. If you are interested, PM me.
[url=http://ambitionstudio.com]Click[/url] to see my latest work [5 days uptime]
[url=http://runepalace.net]Click[/url] to see my other forum
[url=http://runepalace.net/server]Click[/url] to see what a basic installed forum looks like, no skin, nothing.
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/9toccw.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/28ip769.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2h55snc.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: WebHosting + Forum Creation. Ultimate Space, Ultimate Price
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Lol’s.

What makes you think you can buy hosting with all of those ‘Extra’ features you offer already there, (I know for a fact ‘Fantastico’ comes with SMF downloads), and then give them the username and pass and resell it for $6 more?
